manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Elixir 100% Organic Cotton Tampons “Super” Elixir tampons offer peace of mind with tampons that expand at all angles for confident leak protection. These 100% certified organic cotton tampons provide quality that is free of chemicals. The design of these easy-to-use tampons offers convenience, high absorption, and protection against leaks. Organic cotton that is hypoallergenic and made for sensitive skin, so you don’t have to worry about irritating your most delicate skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works ok but not great absorbancy.
reviews.reviewText: Elixir Tampons Made with Certified Organic Cotton BiodegradableThis are compact and discreet. When you open it, you pull the end out to snap it into place to be ready for insertion. There was no issues of feeling it nor being uncomfortable. It says that they are super absorbancy but they do not last long if you have a heavy flow. Lasted about an hour before having to be changed again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Two stars because they do what they're supposed to do I guess. They could be a lot better, though. First, the tampon would leave pieces of cotton behind upon pulling it out. A couple of times, the cotton unraveled when I pulled the string, making it difficult to pull out. I wouldn't use these again or recommend them unless there's a tampon shortage for some reason and these are all you can find.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wife loves that these are organic
reviews.reviewText: The wife is all about organic, and natural products that are in contact with your body, like feminine products and toilet paper. So, she loves that these are organic cotton. Work great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars fine tampons, unique applicator
reviews.reviewText: These are good tampons, and I like that they are all organic cotton. They absorb the amount that I expect from my usual brands for a super tampon, though they are shorter and thicker than my usual brand.They seem intentionally designed to be short so that they can make the tampon plus applicator have a smaller footprint in your bag or pocket, which is nice. It's probably about 2/3 as long as a typical basic tampon with applicator. Because of that, when you open the package, you need to pull the back of the applicator out until it clicks so that it has the ability to push the tampon up and out of the applicator. That wasn't entirely intuitive to me with the first one.This is a fairly small package. If you use mainly super absorptance tampons during your period, you'll likely go through most of the box in one cycle. So I do wish the box were bigger to avoid repurchasing so often. And compared to my usual brand, these are quite expensive, but they are also all organic cotton, which my usuals are not. If that's a requirement for you, these seem like a fine choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good enough to get the job done
reviews.reviewText: Very good quality, absorbs very well compared to other brands. Much safer not having toxic chemicals that can disrupt your hormones and such. Very recommended
